head.title: Add Metadata to {{FileFormatUp}} Files in {{ProgLang}} Applications
head.description: {{ProgLang}} metadata processing API to add metadata information to {{FileFormatUp}} files. Work with metadata standards XMP, EXIF, IPTC, ID3 etc.

header.title: Adding Metadata To {{FileFormatUp}} In {{ProgLang}}
header.description: Add custom metadata properties to a wide range of business documents, images, audio & video file formats using {{ProdFullName}}.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdFullName}} API
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is an advanced metadata fields management and manipulation solution to easily view, update, remove, find, compare, exchange and export metadata information from images and document formats without using any external software. Add metadata details to Word documents, Excel spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, Outlook emails, OneNote, Visio, Project, PDF, AutoCAD, ZIp, Audio and Video file formats along with the support for working with many other metadata processing features.

formats.title: Adding Metadata Properties To Other File Formats
formats.description: Multi format documents and images metadata addition API for {{EnvName}}. Retrieve metadata of some of the popular file formats as stated below.

examples.comment_1: Create a {{TextSignature}} instance and pass the document path
examples.comment_2: Leverage {{QrCodeSignOptions}} to insert a QR-Code into the document
examples.comment_3: Define the signature type and placement on the page
examples.comment_4: Store the document with the newly added QR-Code

steps.title: Guidelines for Generating and Embedding a QR-Code in {{FileFormatUp}} Pages

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) enables the creation of QR-Codes in various widely-used formats and their integration into {{FileFormatUp}} pages. Supporting over 10 distinct QR-Code types, our solution can be seamlessly incorporated into {{EnvName}} applications, enriching them with QR-Code signing capabilities.
content.step_1: Provide the {{FileFormatUp}} file or stream for QR-Code signing.
content.step_2: Input the desired text into the {{QrCodeSignOptions}} instance.
content.step_3: Adjust visual settings such as color, positioning, size, etc.
content.step_4: Save the document containing the QR-Code.

more_features.title: Document Metadata Management
more_features.description: Our comprehensive API streamlines managing document metadata. Access, edit, and manipulate various document properties for improved organization and searchability.

feature_1.title: Metadata Access
feature_1.content: Effortlessly retrieve and process a document's metadata. Gain insights into properties like author, creation date, and many others.

feature_2.title: Metadata Editing
feature_2.content: Modify document metadata directly. Update properties for better organization, searchability, and information accuracy.

feature_3.title: Advanced Metadata Management
feature_3.content: Perform complex operations on document metadata. Efficiently handle tasks like adding custom properties, deleting irrelevant data, and ensuring data consistency.

code_1.title: Customizing a Generated QR-Code
code_1.content: This example details the process of adding a customized QR-Code to a {{FileFormatUp}} page.
code_1.comment_1: Obtain the document to be signed and pass it to {{TextSignature}}
code_1.comment_2: Set up QR-Code options with the required text
code_1.comment_3: Determine the QR-Code's position on the page
code_1.comment_6: Define the font options for the accompanying message
code_1.comment_7: Customize the background color and brush for the QR-Code
code_1.comment_8: Embed the QR-Code into the document
